short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Push LinkedIn contacts or leads to your platforms instantly! RightBound identifies your connected apps, streamlining your workflow.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The RightBound Chrome Extension simplifies your workflow by seamlessly connecting LinkedIn with your preferred platforms. After authenticating with RightBound, the extension automatically identifies your connected apps, allowing you to push contacts or leads directly from their LinkedIn pages to your chosen platforms with a single click. Save time and streamline data transfer by effortlessly integrating LinkedIn into your existing workflow. Install now to enhance your productivity and ensure no contact or lead slips through the cracks!
